name: Chernobyl Walkthrough
description:
This walkthrough was created in 2014 for a project that was based upon the disaster in Chernobyl. This project was designed to be a walkthrough (walk around) to look at the environment after the disaster. Thanks for playing.

(DUE TO UPGRADE FROM UNITY 4 TO UNITY 2017 THE TREE TEXTURES HAVE TURNED WONKY)
